00035 #include "test-rmn.h"

00047 #if 0
00048 START_USAGE (usage)
00049 "Starts SIMRI MRI simulator with different test parameters ",
00050 "SIMRI   Version 2.0  20/12/2006 ",
00051 "",
00052 "Call :simri test= predefined test number, if 0 the object and size parameters are used",
00053 "            object= Number of the object to use",
00054 "       1 : a circle, a square and an ellipse",
00055 "       2 : a circle with a chemical shift",
00056 "       3 : an aire bubble within water > susceptibility artifact",
00057 "       4 : a brain slice",
00058 "                 5 : an homogeneous sphere",
00059 "            size = Voxel number per dimension for the virtual object and the MRI image as well",
00060 "            tacq = Acquisition time in ms (default value : 10)",
00061 "            TE = Echo time in ms (default value : 20 )",
00062 "            TR = Repetition time in ms (default value : 400 )",
00063 "            teta = Flip angle for gradient echo sequences in degree (default value : 90°)",
00064 "            b0 = Main static field BO in Tesla (Default value : 3 T)",
00065 "            db0 = Intra-voxel inhomogenity >> weight of the T2* effect (default value : 0)",
00066 "            b0def = Max value of the parabolic main static field default in tesla (default value : 0)", 
00067 "            flagres = 1 for RF pulse considered ON-resonance, 0 for OFF (1 par defaut)",
00068 "            flagdech = 0 No field default, 1 takes into account precomputed object static field default (susceptibility)",
00069 "                                           2 takes into account the B0 parabolic static field default",
00070 "                                           3 takes 1+2 (2 is the default value)",
00071 "            filter = 1 for an hamming filtering of the K-space, 0 sinon (default value :1)",
00072 "       fileout = name of the MRI module image",
00073 "       seqname = MRI sequence abbreviation (default value : SE2D)",
00074 "            display = 1 to display the reconstructed image (default value=1)",
00075 "            inhomogeneousB1 = 1 to allow precomputed B1 inhomogeneities by using file ../data/B1map/B1t.txt", 
00076 "                                   (transmission field) and ../data/B1map/B1r.txt (reception field)",
00077 "                                   as complex normalized B1 maps (default value=0)",
00078 "",
00079 " test = 0 -> Full test",
00080 "",
00081 " test = 1 -> Test RMN : Free Induction Decay en T2*",
00082 " test = 2 -> Test RMN : Echo de Spin du au T2* ",
00083 " test = 5 -> Test Brain ",
00084 
00085 "",
00086 " test = 210 -> Spin Echo 2D, 1 component, object and image 32",
00087 " test = 211 -> Spin Echo 2D, 1 component, object and image 64",
00088 " test = 212 -> Spin Echo 2D, 1 component, object and image 128",
00089 " test = 213 -> Spin Echo 2D, 1 component, object and image 256",
00090 " test = 214 -> Spin Echo 2D, 1 component, object and image 512",
00091 " test = 215 -> Spin Echo 2D, 1 component, object and image 1024",
00092 " test = 216 -> Spin Echo 2D, 1 component, object 1024 and image 256",
00093 "",
00094 " test = 220 -> Spin Echo 2D, 2 components, object and image 32",
00095 " test = 221 -> Spin Echo 2D, 2 components, object and image 64",
00096 " test = 222 -> Spin Echo 2D, 2 components, object and image 128",
00097 " test = 223 -> Spin Echo 2D, 2 components, object and image 256",
00098 " test = 224 -> Spin Echo 2D, 2 components, object and image 512",
00099 " test = 225 -> Spin Echo 2D, 2 components, object and image 1024",
00100 " test = 226 -> Spin Echo 2D, 2 components, object 1024 and image 256",
00101 "",
00102 " test = 250 -> Gradient Echo 2D, 1 component, object and image 32",
00103 " test = 251 -> Gradient Echo 2D, 1 component, object and image 64",
00104 " test = 252 -> Gradient Echo 2D, 1 component, object and image 128",
00105 "",
00106 " test = 260 -> Spin Echo 2D on a brain 256x256 ",
00107 "",
00108 " test = 310 -> Spin Echo 3D, 1 component, object and image 16",
00109 " test = 311 -> Spin Echo 3D, 1 component, object and image 32",
00110 " test = 312 -> Spin Echo 3D, 1 component, object and image 64",
00111 " test = 313 -> Spin Echo 3D, 1 component, object and image 128",
00112 " test = 314 -> Spin Echo 3D, 1 component, object 128 and image 64",
00113 "",
00114 " test = 320 -> Spin Echo 3D, 2 components, object and image 16",
00115 " test = 321 -> Spin Echo 3D, 2 components, object and image 32",
00116 " test = 322 -> Spin Echo 3D, 2 components, object and image 64",
00117 " test = 323 -> Spin Echo 3D, 2 components, object and image 128",
00118 " test = 324 -> Spin Echo 3D, 2 components, object 128 and image 64",
00119 
00120 "",
00121 "Exemple: simri test=220",
00122 "",
00123 FINISH_USAGE

00126 int
00127 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00128 {
00129  int    test;
00130  double tacq,TE,TR,teta,b0,db0,b0def;
00131  int flagres,flagdech,filter,object,size,display;
00132  int inhomogeneousB1;
00133  char * fileout,*seqname;
00134 
00135 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
00136  MPI_Init(&argc,&argv);
00137  MPIL_Trace_on();
00138 #endif
00139 
00140 /* Gestion des parametres passes au main */
00141  IdArgInit(argc,argv);
00142  test    = IdArgGetInt("test",0);
00143  tacq   =(double) IdArgGetFloat("tacq",10);
00144  TE   = (double) IdArgGetFloat("TE",20);
00145  TR   = (double) IdArgGetFloat("TR",400);
00146  teta   = (double) IdArgGetFloat("teta",90.);
00147  b0    = (double) IdArgGetFloat("b0",1.);
00148  db0   = (double) IdArgGetFloat("db0",0.);
00149  b0def   = (double) IdArgGetFloat("b0def",0.);
00150  flagres   = IdArgGetInt("flagres",1);
00151  flagdech  = IdArgGetInt("flagdech",2);
00152  filter  = IdArgGetInt("filter",1);
00153  object   = IdArgGetInt("object",1);
00154  size  = IdArgGetInt("size",32);
00155  fileout = IdArgGetString("fileout","recimage.acr");
00156  seqname = IdArgGetString("seqname","SE2D");
00157  display   = IdArgGetInt("display",1);
00158  inhomogeneousB1 = IdArgGetInt("inhomogeneousB1", 0);
00159  printf("seq=%s fileout=%s \n",seqname,fileout);
00160 
00161 switch(test)
00162  {
00163 /* Test de sequence à valider */
00164   case 0:
00165   {
00166    TestSequence2D(object,size,size,tacq,TE,TR,teta,b0,db0,b0def,flagres,flagdech,filter,fileout,seqname,display, inhomogeneousB1);
00167    break;  
00168   }
00169 /* Test RMN */
00170   case 1:
00171   {
00172    TestFID1D(2048,512);
00173    break;  
00174   }
00175   case 2:
00176   {
00177    TestEchoSpin1D(2048,512);
00178    break;  
00179   }
00180   case 3:
00181   {
00182    TestTrainEchoSpin1D(1024,512,8);
00183    break;  
00184   }
00185 /* Test Brain */
00186   case 5:
00187   {
00188    TestSequence2D(4,size,size,tacq,TE,TR,teta,b0,db0,b0def,flagres,flagdech,filter,fileout,seqname,display, inhomogeneousB1);
00189    break;  
00190   }
00191 
00192 /* Test Defaut de champ */
00193   case 10:
00194   {
00195    TestSequence2D(3,64,64,tacq,TE,TR,teta,b0,db0,b0def,flagres,flagdech,filter,fileout,seqname,display, inhomogeneousB1);
00196    break;  
00197   }
00198 /* Test SE 2D */
00199   case 210:
00200   {
00201    TestSequence2D(1,32,32,tacq,TE,TR,teta,b0,db0,b0def,flagres,flagdech,filter,fileout,"SE2D",display, inhomogeneousB1);
00202    break;  
00203   }
00204   case 211:
00205   {
00206    TestSequence2D(1,64,64,tacq,TE,TR,teta,b0,db0,b0def,flagres,flagdech,filter,fileout,"SE2D",display, inhomogeneousB1);
00207    break;  
00208   }
00209   case 212:
00210   {
00211    TestSequence2D(1,128,128,tacq,TE,TR,teta,b0,db0,b0def,flagres,flagdech,filter,fileout,"SE2D",display, inhomogeneousB1);
00212    break;  
00213   }
00214   case 213:
00215   {
00216    TestSequence2D(1,256,256,tacq,TE,TR,teta,b0,db0,b0def,flagres,flagdech,filter,fileout,"SE2D",display, inhomogeneousB1);

00222    break;  
00223   }

00225   {

00227    break;  
00228   }

00232    break;  
00233   }

00253   }

00258   }

00262    break;

00267    break;  
00268   }

00289    break;  
00290   }
